pr_title: [zephyr-exporter] Property for export executions with specific statuses

timeline.bodyText: statusesForExport sounds like we should export only test cases with such statuses, but if this is empty we export all test cases, maybe set some default value?
timeline.author: uarlouski
uarlouski
valfirst
